LanguageData.TOTR.RequireRailTerrainDesc: Controls whether train vehicles require special railroad ballast terrain to move on the colony map. This is different from the world map which requires trains to move along railroads.
LanguageData.TOTR.HideRoadBuildingFeatureLabel: Hide road building feature from Trains of the Rim
LanguageData.TOTR.HideRoadBuildingFeatureDesc: Hides the gizmos for road building from Trains of the Rim, in case you prefer using another road mod like Rails and Roads of the Rim.
LanguageData.TOTR.RecallTrainDesc: Orders the train vehicles to return to the saved positions
LanguageData.TOTR.CycleTextureDesc: Cycles between available textures for this vehicle
LanguageData.TOTR.SaveNewPositionDesc: Sets the train vehicle's saved position to its current position
LanguageData.TOTR.CaravanRequiresLocomotive: A train caravan must have at least one locomotive.
